description.title: Java/JEE & Web Expert
description: Hands-on information technology leader and Individual Contributor with 15 years of experience and a proven track record of designing and delivering web-based/UI rich applications and scalable systems

bio:
Hands-on information technology leader and Individual Contributor with 15 years of experience and a proven track record of designing and delivering Desktop/web-based/UI rich applications and scalable systems.

Close to 10 years of experience on Java/J2EE platform and technologies. Over 7 years of management experience as a Lead, Manager and Architect.

Thorough knowledge of the complete software development process and ability to take a project from inception and analysis through to production deployment and support. Experience in architecting and design/development of applications in traditional software delivery model.

? Databases – Oracle, DB2, SQL Server, MYSQL, MS-Access
? Languages/API - Java, Swing, JEE(Servlets, JSP, JDBC, EJB, JPA, Java Mail), C, C++
? Application Servers – JBOSS, WEBSPHERE, WEBLOGIC
? Frameworks/Stacks – Struts, Hibernate, Webservices
? UI Technologies – HTML, JavaScript, CSS, AJAX, JQUERY, JSON, XSLT
I am available 40+ hrs a week.

abstrac: Java / EJB / Grails / Mobile App Developer
bio:
Since 2009 I am involved with Software Development. Java is being my strong field of technology, but along with I have also expertise with mobile application development platforms like Android and iOS. Worked with different Java APIs like Java Swing, SWT, Jasper Report, Open Rule Engine, Apache POI, iText, DOM, JAXB, JAXP, Jersey, JSON, XPath, Quartz, EJB, Hibernate, JPA etc. Web application framework technologies includes JSP/Servlet, Struts, Spring, Groovy & Grails, Liferay, etc. With these application frameworks, application servers I've used includes Apache Tomcat, JBoss, Jetty. I've also worked on Jasper Server to generate report from a dedicated server. Experience with client side scripting languages is with JavaScript & jQuery. With Android app development, have experience with Android version 5, 6, 7. For iOS have experience with version 6, 7, 8, 9.

All these API/Frameworks are used to develop applications of different domains like Auction Management System, Incident Management System, Probationer Management System, Workflow Application, Document Management System, Information Management System, etc.

bio:
My family and I currently reside in Mesa, AZ where my husband is the Director of Operations for a helicopter manufacture. We have two children who are active in sports as well as music. In addition to being an Independent Consultant I teach the second grade class at our church and volunteer with their school, girl scouts, and football club. I have over 20 years of combined professional experience in healthcare, business management/fundraising, and served on the Board of Directors for a non-profit youth organization. 

I am passionate about healthy living and encourage all generations to work towards a healthier more active lifestyle. I do this by working with personal trainers and fitness experts to create youth programs focused on nutrition and exercise. I am working towards a personal goal for 2014 to obtain my Personal Trainer Certification with a special focus on Youth Sports and Women's Health.

bio:
Certified Project Manager experienced in the Information Technology field, and legal services provider industry.

As a project manager, my main role is to define the project’s objectives, plan, schedule, and control activities by applying technical and managerial skills to satisfy project requirements.

Additionally, I communicate with clients and stakeholders to create the right workflow, understand deadline requirements, provide updates & status reports, and oversee team members & third-party contractors throughout the entire project life cycle.

abstrac: Quality That You Can Count ON
bio:
I've been in the business world my whole life. Growing up in the contracting world gave me a strong work ethic and need to succeed. In my adult life I found success in the administrative field, which eventually led to an interest in health care.

Upon entry in the world of medicine I hit the ground running, and within 5 years worked my way up to management in one of the nations top pediatric hospitals. I have led two very lucrative insurance projects, trained new hires, managed teams and finances, and dabbled in marketing to name just a few.

When I am not working I enjoy spending time with my beautiful family, and staying active within my community. I find solace in bike riding, and expansion through books. I live by a personal motto that you are only as good as the effort you put into your life and the commitments you make.

Please take a look at my resume for further information on my accomplishments and experiences. I can be reached at all times via email at talinthia@gmail.com.

Available 7 days a week
Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday evening only
Wednesday and Sunday all day
Friday available after 2:00 p.m.

Best contacted via email at talinthia@gmail.com

abstrac: Deadline Conscious Writer Available For Hire
bio: For the past two years, I have been pursuing ghost writing as a means to work while I am going to school. I specialize in the editing, rewriting, and original creation of both short stories and full-length novel efforts. I can also write short factual reports as need be (such as a mini-biography) provided I am given a reasonable amount of time to do the research and subsequent write-up.
I have very open hours. My rates are negotiable within reason. The best way to contact me is through this website's message center. I promise to be prompt in return.
